mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CART_TBL USING DUAL ON (MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id} AND PRO_NUM = #{pro_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CART_AMOUNT = CART_AMOUNT + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(CART_CODE, PRO_NUM, MBSP_ID, CART_AMOUNT) VALUES(seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL,#{pro_num},#{mbsp_id},#{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.CART_CODE, c.PRO_NUM, c.CART_AMOUNT, p.PRO_NAME, p.PRO_PRICE, p.PRO_DISCOUNT, p.PRO_PUBLISHER, p.PRO_CONTENT, p.PRO_UP_FOLDER, p.PRO_IMG, p.PRO_AMOUNT, p.PRO_BUY, p.PRO_DATE, p.PRO_UPDATEDATE FROM PRODUCT_TBL p INNER JOIN CART_TBL c ON p.PRO_NUM = c.PRO_NUM WHERE c.MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
